scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:eu-central-1:221875718260:certificate/8d92169c-ea74-4086-b407-b951429ac2b1 -c environmentName=${ENVIRONMENT_NAME} -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:eu-central-1:221875718260:certificate/20023378-c036-41df-90b9-c005938c4423 -c environmentName=${ENVIRONMENT_NAME} -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
